pylapp.tapster.client.android.ui.permissions

Class DexterPermissionsManagerSkeleton

  • pylapp.tapster.client.android.ui.permissions.DexterPermissionsManagerSkeleton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PermissionsManagerStub

    public class DexterPermissionsManagerSkeleton
implements PermissionsManagerStub

    Skeleton based on design pattern Bridge which provides the declarations of methods to call so as to deal with with an object or a library which deals with permissions, grant dialogs, etc. This pattern is used so as to avoid an activity to have too many dependencies and code about the way permissions are asked, granted and managed. A library is used, so let's thing a step further in case of the death of this library.

    • Constructor Summary

      DexterPermissionsManagerSkeleton()
      Skeleton based on design pattern Bridge which provides the declarations of methods to call so as to deal with with an object or a library which deals with permissions, grant dialogs, etc. This pattern is used so as to avoid an activity to have too many dependencies and code about the way permissions are asked, granted and managed. A library is used, so let's thing a step further in case of the death of this library.

      • DexterPermissionsManagerSkeleton

        public DexterPermissionsManagerSkeleton()

        Skeleton based on design pattern Bridge which provides the declarations of methods to call so as to deal with with an object or a library which deals with permissions, grant dialogs, etc. This pattern is used so as to avoid an activity to have too many dependencies and code about the way permissions are asked, granted and managed. A library is used, so let's thing a step further in case of the death of this library.

                             java.lang.String permission,
                             java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String message)

        Requests the grant to use a permission

        Parameters:
        activity -

        • The activity where the dialogs are come from

        callback -

        • A callback to trigger if needed

        permission -

        • The permission to grant

        title -

        • The title of the message which can be displayed

        message -

        • More details about the use of the permission
